entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:09 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
